content.description: Consider the following code segment, which is intended to store ten consecutive even integers, beginning with 2, in the list evenList. Assume that evenList is initially empty.
content.question: i <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 1REPEAT 10 TIMES{<MISSING CODE>}Which of the following can be used to replace <MISSING CODE> so that the code segment works as intended?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
